description: This file defines the ExoPlayerManager class, which encapsulates lifecycle management and setup of an ExoPlayer instance for media playback in an Android application. It includes methods for creating, preparing, releasing the player, and handling media items with optional live stream configuration.

classes.name: ExoPlayerManager
classes.description: A lifecycle-aware wrapper class that manages an ExoPlayer instance, providing methods to create, prepare media items, and release the player for streaming within an Android app.

methods.name: ExoPlayerManager
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the manager with a given Android Context.

methods.name: player
methods.description: A property that lazily initializes and returns the ExoPlayer instance.

methods.name: createPlayer
methods.description: Internal method that constructs and configures a new ExoPlayer instance.

methods.name: prepare
methods.description: Prepares the player with a media URL, optional title, live stream flag, and resume position.

methods.name: release
methods.description: Releases the ExoPlayer resource and sets the internal reference to null.
